title: Flu Virus Exposure and Disorder Likelihood

content.question: While pregnant, Marley was exposed to the flu virus. Based on current research, which psychological disorder is Marley’s child most likely to develop?

choices.label: Depression, because prenatal flu virus exposure is positively correlated with increased risk of depression.
Specific phobia, because prenatal flu virus exposure is positively correlated with an increased risk of phobias.
Anorexia nervosa, because the flu virus can be extremely stressful to the developing fetus.
Schizophrenia, because flu virus exposure is positively correlated with an increased risk of developing schizophrenia.

content.answer: Schizophrenia, because flu virus exposure is positively correlated with an increased risk of developing schizophrenia.

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
